overview: What a crew! Kody, Damien, Dean, and big Jake. Jake returns to Active Duty after a year off talking a pretty good game. He's ready to take a more significant step across the line. Getting other hot guys to cross the line has been Jake's specialty, so he knows all of the particular "ins and outs" of that deal. But today things take a turn on Big Jake and he gets plowed out by four hot guys in Behind The Line!
title: Behind the Line
